title: Stuffed peppers with rice and tomato sauce

ingredients.content: 2 slices white bread, cut in pieces
2 heaped tsp vegetable stock paste, homemade

preparations.content: Place onions and garlic clove in mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 5<b>.
Add beef mince, white bread, mustard, salt, paprika, black pepper and egg and mix <b>1 min 30 sec/<b>.
Cut the tops off the peppers and set aside. Remove all seeds and fill peppers with mince mixture, then replace cut-off tops over each pepper. Place stuffed peppers in Varoma.

Place water and vegetable stock paste in mixing bowl, insert simmering basket and weigh rice into it. Place Varoma into position and steam <b>30 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>. Remove Varoma and remove simmering basket with aid of spatula. Transfer rice and stuffed peppers into a serving dish and keep warm. Transfer cooking liquid to a bowl and set aside.
Avoiding blade, place butter and flour in mixing bowl and sauté <b>3 min/100°C/speed 2<b>.
Add 200 g reserved cooking liquid, chopped tomatoes, tomato purée, salt, black pepper, sugar and lemon juice and cook <b>5 min/100°C/speed 4<b>. Serve stuffed peppers with rice and tomato sauce.
